compliance_assessment.framework_description: International standard for information security management systems (ISMS) focusing on risk management and control implementation.

requirements.requirement: Implement organizational security policies and procedures for information security.
requirements.evidence: Security controls are planned but not yet implemented.

requirements.requirement: Implement technical controls for data protection (encryption, access controls).
requirements.evidence: Encryption and access controls are in planning phase.
recommendations: Deploy database encryption at rest/in transit
